PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-08212022-06-24,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  GAC
ActExport and Import Permits Act
SubjectOrder Amending the Import Control List
PrecisOrder Amending the IMPORT CONTROL LIST (ICL) in order to (1) add the one toxic chemical and three families of toxic chemicals that have recently been added to Schedule 1A of the Chemical Weapons Convention Schedule to the ICL; and (2) address editorial issues raised by the Standing Joint Committee for the Scrutiny of Regulations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2022-0161 Publication Date: 2022-07-06
AttachmentsAttachment
